process-def.name: :RBA-AD-VMware_Infrastructure:Utilities:Cluster_Operations:Construct Item for Retrieve Cluster Virtual Machines

input.description:
Name of the cluster whose virtual machines are to be retrieved.
Valid value: String

The valid values are true and false,
Description of 'retrieve-all-vm-properties'
This boolean flag decides whether the all the VM properties are fetched or only VM name and type, if set to true all the properties of each vm is returned, otherwise only VM name and type is returned.
Default Value is false.
For description of each parameter tags, please refer Construct Item for Retrieve Cluster Virtual Machines process.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <xsl:if test="string-length('${fetch VM all properties}') != 0"> <retrieve-all-vm-properties>${fetch VM all properties}</retrieve-all-vm-properties> </xsl:if> <parameters> <cluster-compute-resource>${cluster compute resource}</cluster-compute-resource> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
